channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Stranded in Dubai, Abu Dhabi? Here is how the UAE is helping passengers
Oil flow and rice exports hit, markets dipped: How the Iran war is affecting India
Inside Natanz, the nuclear facility that Iran claims was struck by US-Israel strikes
Ayatollah Alireza Arafi: Will he be Iran’s next supreme leader?
Why is Israel attacking Lebanon amid war with Iran?
‘Burn in hell’: Who is the Australian journalist who celebrated Khamenei’s death on air?
When Frankenstein’s monster strikes: Collapse of Pakistan’s strategic delusion
item.description: For years, Pakistan believed Afghanistan could be shaped through the Taliban from behind the curtain. Influence in Kabul was treated as insurance, a buffer against vulnerability elsewhere

item.title: The runaway ‘nagin’ of Uttar Pradesh: Decoding India’s enduring love affair with snakes
item.description: A bizarre elopement story from Uttar Pradesh reveals how deeply snake myths continue to shape the country’s cultural imagination

item.title: Israeli strikes on Iran show it was never only about Tehran going nuclear
item.description: Israel’s pre-emptive strikes have once again derailed a near-final nuclear deal, revealing that the conflict with Iran was never solely about its nuclear programme but equally about its missile capability and regional power projection

item.title: How Carney’s visit has revived strategic convergence in Indo-Canadian ties
item.description: As both India and Canada share numerous commonalities and convergences on global, regional and bilateral issues of concern, there is significant scope for consolidation and enhanced synergy in their ties beyond occasional strains

item.title: How PM Modi’s Israel visit aligns with both India’s interests and ideals
item.description: In an era of unreliable allies, shifting power architectures, and an increasingly fragmented global order, India is forging relationships that serve its interests and its ideals. This isn't a contradiction; it's diplomatic sophistication

item.title: This Holi, skip the rush: Explore the hidden Mewar around Udaipur
item.description: When Udaipur feels overrun, the real magic of Mewar begins just beyond its city limits
